A game of portents and poetry.

Originally made for Global Game Jam 2016, theme 'RITUAL'.

---

programming/design/writing by dante

music by britt

additional writing by @olive_bones / @authentithicc / @siegarettes

---

NEW in update 1.2: 11 new items, 11 new poems

Rock Paper Shotgun: "Essentially a small poetry generator, but a stylish and portentious one at that. The candles flicker, the offering flames burn, and the diviner hovers over everything like a vulture."

Unwinnable: "...right up our creepy occult alley."

Absolute Mag: "Do not delay, fate does not wait for lost time."

PC Gamer: "...the game exudes a spooky atmosphere, like that time you tried a oujia board with your friends."
